Introduction
Overview over this manual
Chapter is concerned with the technical details of installing and running this package. Chapter explains how &GaussForHomalg; works and what you need to know to extend &homalg; with your own rings. Also included in this manual is a documented list of the most important methods and functions for this linking process. Anyone interested in source code should just check out the files in the gap/pkg/GaussForHomalg/gap folder (&see; Appendix ).
